summary: Add a new video section between the experience and contact sections featuring the 'Glass Half Empty' video with HTML5 video controls, custom styling to match the portfolio's glass-morphism design theme, and responsive layout. The implementation requires updates to HTML structure, CSS styling, JavaScript functionality, and navigation.

action_plan.description: Add video section HTML structure between experience and contact sections with HTML5 video element, controls, and glass-morphism container styling
Add 'Videos' navigation link to navbar menu and update mobile navigation to include the new section
Create CSS styling for video section matching glass-morphism theme with backdrop-filter blur, responsive video sizing, custom controls styling, and hover effects
Update JavaScript to include video section in scroll animations, navigation active link detection, and add any custom video control functionality if needed
Test video playback functionality, responsive design across devices, and ensure proper integration with existing scroll animations and navigation

risks: Video file size (16MB) may cause slow loading on slower connections
MOV format may not be supported on all browsers (should consider adding MP4 fallback)
Video quality is not HD so sizing needs to be carefully balanced to avoid pixelation
Custom video controls styling may require cross-browser testing
Mobile video playback behavior varies across devices and may need specific handling
dependencies: Existing glass-morphism CSS custom properties (--primary, --bg-primary, etc.)
Current section styling patterns and fade-in animations
Navigation scroll detection and active link functionality
Responsive grid system and mobile breakpoints
Video file already exists at static/videos/glass_half_empty.mov
issue_title: Feature Request: Add video section with playable 'Glass Half Empty' video
